word: \n     Jacob could no longer withhold his consent, and he bade his sons prepare for the journey. They were to take to the ruler a present of such things as the destitute country afforded, a little balm, and a little honey, spices, myrrh, nuts and almonds, also \"double money' in their sacks,-that formerly returned, and some for the present purchase. \"Take also your brother, and arise, go again unto the man.\"
